content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 4, Stoke City 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 4, Stoke City 0.
Phil Bardsley (Stoke City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Glenn Whelan.
Attempt blocked. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked. Assisted by Marc Muniesa.
